alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 13 at 2:30AM MST until December 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible through the day Wednesday. Snow and blowing snow will result in whiteout conditions at times. This includes Interstate 25 and Interstate 90. Road closures are likely in rural areas.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
